title: Multi-platform Endpoint Management
sub_title: Devices of varying platforms? Hexnode thrives in a diverse environment.

data.title: Android
data.description: Remotely deploy, manage, monitor and secure Android devices in your organization. Set compliance benchmarks and leverage Android Enterprise to it’s full capabilities.

data.title: iOS
data.description: Manage, secure, and monitor iOS devices in your organization. With Hexnode’s ABM and ASM integration, deploy devices and apps with ease.

data.title: macOS
data.description: Leverage Hexnode’s desktop management capabilities to their fullest. Securely deploy and manage macOS devices in bulk with Hexnode UEM.

data.title: Windows
data.description: Spearhead modern PC management in your organization with Hexnode. Set limit’s and monitor PC health and compliance remotely with Hexnode UEM.

data.title: tvOS
data.description: Remotely manage and secure tvOS devices with Hexnode. Display your brand aesthetics and custom messages on tvOS devices with Hexnode UEM.

data.title: FireOS
data.description: Enroll Amazon Fire tablets, phones and e-readers in Hexnode UEM to manage them all from a single console.
